Package com.github.mafelp.minecraft.skins

Class Skin

java.lang.Object
com.github.mafelp.minecraft.skins.Skin
public class Skin
extends java.lang.Object
Class with information about a Player's skin

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Skin​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
